detailsData.title: Experienced
detailsData.content: Over 23 years of experience as a business attorney for public and private companies. Martin understands that time is a valuable commodity to us all.

detailsData.title: Efficient
detailsData.content: Martin works differently than most attorneys. He focuses on getting parties to work together collaboratively using synergy and partnership.

detailsData.title: Effective
detailsData.content: Martin is an amazing asset as inside counsel to our business. He saves us time, effort and money!

detailsData.title: Great Communicator
detailsData.content: Martin is responsive and great with communicating and explaining every step and process. He really listened and gave me great advice relating to an urgent legal problem.

address: 61 Avenida De Orinda, Ste E, Orinda, CA 94563
linkNames: MAKE AN APPOINTMENT WITH SANCES LAW, P.C.
valueProp: Our mission is to connect with clients in order to help them build businesses with integrity.
CTA: Make an Appointment With Sances Law, P.C.

testimonalData.text: An amazing person. For me, he was like a god send person.
testimonalData.author: Saravana C.

testimonalData.text: Very easy to do business with, clear communication, quick project completion and reasonably priced.
testimonalData.author: Art K.

testimonalData.text: He really listened and gave me great advice relating to an urgent legal problem. Highly recommended.
